casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Berkley Eugene HAIRSTON. No. 488P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2004. Berkley E. Hairston, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 16th day of September 2004 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Guilford County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st day of September 2004."
